document_data.name: Denneth Rhardantan
document_data.mainbody: '''Denneth Rhardantan''' was a man from [[Mistledale]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Storm Silverhand claimed he had many fast horses.
document_data.Relationships: As of Mirtul in 1479 DR, he owed Storm Silverhand much money.
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, [[Storm Silverhand]] lured out a number of [[highknight]]s through a portal to [[Shadowdale]]. She convinced their leader, [[Eskrel Starbridge]], to trade a ''[[teleport ring]]'' in his keeping, originally belonging to Queen [[Filfaeril Obarskyr]], for the name of a man who owed her much coin and had enough fast [[horse]]s for his entire troop to make it back to [[Cormyr]]. The man's name was Denneth Rhardantan; she also yielded a word, "glimmerdeep", which would make him give them away for free to whoever asked.
